examples: No ṣoak g ’ali?::Is the baby crying? || Do: ’o ’am ha-ñu:kud g ’a’al?::Who’s taking care of the children?
Ñ-vi:vi’ibaḍ ’at na:to ’i:da hoa.::My great-grandma made this basket. || ’Ant o ha’i ha-gagḍa g hoaha.::I’m going to sell some of the baskets.
Napt ’apec g ’e-vo’ikuḍ?::Did you make your bed?||Do: t o ha-ke:g c vo:pikuḍ?::Who’s going to clean the beds?
’I be:kai hegi ’iks mant o ñ-ce’ewi.::Bring me that blanket to cover with.||Ṣa:cu pt o na:to ’idam ’i’ikskaj?::What are you going to make with these pieces of cloth?
’U:pam ce:k ’i:da kahon.::Put this box back.||’Oig ’am ha-ku:kpiok hegam kakhon.::Go ahead and open those boxes.
Do: ’o wuḍ hegi viappoi?::Who is that boy?||Hegam vi:piop ’at ’an o cicvi g ṣoñgivul.::Those boys are going to play kickball.
Ñeo’okĭ ’o wuḍ hegi mo ’an hab cu’ig t-’oag ’eḍ.::Language is what exists in our brains.
Napt gegos g mi:tol?::Did you feed the cat?
Napt gegos g mi:tol?::Did you feed the cat?
’I be:kai hegi daikuḍ.::Bring that chair.
Hegi 'o ḍ ñ-gogsga.::That’s my dog.
Napt ’am daphiu g ñ-’ipuḍ?::Did you iron my dress?||’Att o va ha’i nolavt g vepcij ’i’ipuḍ.::We’re going to buy some new dresses.
Pi g ’ab hu ṣa’i ta:tam g ’e-wuhi!::Don’t touch your eye!||S-momhogid g ñ-vu:pui.::My eyes itch.
Nap s-ma:c hegi cehia?::Do you know that girl?
Gaswuañ g ’ali mo’o.::Brush the baby’s hair.
’Ant o nai g ñ-kanjul.::I’ll turn my light on.||Sa’i si s-mams g kakanul.::The lights are real bright.
Nap ñeid hegi tonlig?::Do you see that light?
Ba’iñ g ’e-kulañ!::Take your medicine!||Hegi maṣ ḍ kulañ gagḍadam ’o si s-ma:c g na:nko ma:s kuklañ.::The pharmacists knows a lot about different types of medicine.
Ant o vi:p g viohog.::I'm going to chew on some mesquite beans.
Cevaj g kui.::The tree is tall.
’Ant o vakoa g ñ-ṣaliv.::I’m going to wash my pants.||’An g ha-na:ngia g ṣaṣaliv.::Hang up the pairs of pants.
’O’ohon g ’e-ce:gig ’id ’ab tapial.::Sign your name on this paper.
Ge habaḍk g ñ-mo’ockuḍ!::My pillow’s just flat!
Hema g da’icud g hodi!::Throw a rock!
Nap mumku?::Are you sick?
’I ku:p g vindoñ.::Close the window.||Ṣa s-bibtagĭ g vipindoñ.::The windows are kind of dirty.
Hebi ke:k g ’e-ki:?::Where is your house?||Go:k ki:k ’o cu:c ’im hab ha’ap.::There are two houses on the other side of there.
Hema g hekaj g hoas-ha’a.::Use a plate.||M o si ha-vapkoa g hoahas-haha’a.::Wash the plates good.
Hema ñ-ma:k g ’uskonakuḍ.::Give me a fork.||Pi ’am hu vi’is g ’u’uskonakuḍ.::There are no forks left.
Hugiñ g ’e-kusalkaj.::Eat it with your spoon.||Ha’i ’i ’u’ukai g kuksal.::Bring some spoons.
’I ku:p g ku:paḍag!::Close the door!
’Ab g va:kid ’i:da kotoñ.::Put this shirt on.
’I naggia hegi kotoñ::Hang that shirt up.
Gḍ g hu toa’i g ’e-kakalsi:do.::Put your socks away.
Ñeid g ñ-ṣu:ṣk!::Look at my shoes!
Hi:m k ku:piok g kolhi.::Go open the fence.
S-mohogid g ñ-kahi.::My leg itches.||No s-kokok g ’em-kakkio?::Do your legs hurt?
S-kokok g ñ-ta:taḍ.::My feet hurt.
’An g da:ṣ g ko:ba mi:ṣ da:m.::Set the cup on the table.||M o si ha-dadagkoa g mimṣ.::Wipe the tables down.
Napt dagĭto g ’e-lialga ’an mi:sa da:m?::Did you leave your money on the table?
’Ant o hekaj ’i:da ha’a mant o na:to g mu:ñ.::I’m going to use this pot to make beans.
Kiap s-vapḍag g dadagkoanakuḍ.::The towels are still wet.
Dagkoan g ’ali wuhioṣa g ’e-tovaṣkaj.::Wipe the baby’s face with your handkerchief.
S-ke:gaj g monjelij.::Her headscarf is pretty.
Ñ-bayuka ’o ḍ ’o:la.::My necklace is gold.
S-vegĭ maskal g vakial.::The cowboy has a red neckerchief.
Si tonoḍ g huhu’u.::The stars are really shining.
Heg o gḍ hu ki: do’ag da:m.::He lives on top of the mountain.
Ba: ’o ka:c g vo:g?::Where is the road?
Pi g ’am hu ṣa’i hekaj hegi vainomĭ.::Don’t use that knife.
No ’i:da ḍ m-kavyuga?::Is this your horse?
No meḍ g ma:gina?::Is the car running?
’Ant o vakoa g ñ-kalit.::I’m going to wash my car.
Ñeokculid g ’o’ohon.::Read the book.
B ’o ma:s mo g ’i:bdag.::It looks like a heart.
S-mohogid g ñ-da:k.::My nose itches.
S-ko’ok g ñ-na:k.::I have an earache.
Hukṣ ’at g ñ-kusvo.::S/he scratched my neck.
Si ñ-ṣoñhi ’an ñ-ba:ṣo ’an.::He sure punched my chest.
No s-kokok g m-koktva?::Do you shoulders hurt?
Mant s-ko’okam ju: g ñ-to:n.::I hurt my knee.
Hekĭ ’ant hu wua g ñ-’añilo.::I lost my ring.
Mu’i ’o ha’icu g nanhagio heg ’eḍa ’oidag.::There are lot of mice in that field.
’Ab g va:kid g ’e-vagtalig.::Put your jacket on.
Nap ge la:bis?::Do you have a pencil?
S-kokmagĭ g cevagĭ.::The clouds are gray.
Gm hu me: g taḍai.::The roadrunner ran over there.
’I naggia g sa:vano.::Hang up the bedsheet.
Ṣa:cu m ’e’eṣa heg ’eḍa ’oidag?::What do you guys plant in that field?
Napt mehi g ’e-ne:ñ?::Did you burn your tongue?
Kegcun g ’e-ta:tamĭ!::Brush your teeth!
Ha’i ’o ’am hi va hekaj g hovij tatk mat o ha-na:to g hoaha.::Some people use banana yucca root to make baskets.
S-ko’ok g ñ-vo:k.::My stomach hurts.
Dagkoan g ’e-ka:m.::Wipe your cheek.
Si ṣoñhi g ñ-’at!::S/he sure hit me on the butt!
Hegi hujuḍ ’o ’an kolhi t-’ab him.::That lizard is crawling on the fence.
Mu’i voptoñ ’i:da ’ipuḍ.::This dress has many buttons.
Ba: pt toa g ñ-vopda?::Where did you put my boots?
Ha’i ’i ’u’ukai g ’u’us.::Bring some sticks over here.
Si s-io’ovĭ ’i:da kalna:yo.::This pomegranate is really sweet.
Ha’i g na:to g bid ṣa:mt.::Make some adobe bricks.
S-mohogid g ñ-’o:.::My back itches.
You’re going to hurt your ankle.
Write your name down.
Is your child a soldier (in the army)?
Do: t m-na:tojul ’i:da ṣavkuḍ?
He’ekio ’o:’o ’an hab cu’ig t-cu:kug ’eḍa?::How many bones do we have in our body?
’I:da s-kavk ha’icu mo ’an hab cu’ig t-mo’o ’eḍ ’o ḍ "koṣva".::This hard thing in our heads is the skull.
Nap hebi hema ñeid g mavid?::Have you ever seen a mountain lion?
S-’a’amḍak g gegevo.::The bobcats are friendly.
Hegi mo ’am si mu’i vapagt ’o hab ’e-’a’aga "cevo".::The thing that makes a bunch of holes in the groud is a "gopher".
No ḍ ’i:da g m-navoj?::Is this your friend?
S-mu’uk g ho’ibaḍ.::The needle is sharp.
Hema ñ-ma:k g cemait.::Pass me a tortilla.
Napt nolavt hegi tlo:gi?::Did you buy that truck?
Ba: ’o ke:k g maṣcamakuḍ?::Where is the school located?
Napt 'am o ce:gim g ma:kai?::Are you going to go see the doctor?
